string-array.name: funny_sentences
string-array.item: The blue doctor kicked the big doctor.
The crazy turtle hopped over the thin brussel sprout.
The purple milkshake tripped over the odd-looking nerd.
The small sky hopped over the weird tortoise.
The pretty nerd helped the fat cat.
The weird cloud hopped over the cool doctor.

resources.string: There was an error getting data from the blog.
